section.names: python\ 3\ with\ lists,\ loops,\ conditionals,\ and\ functions
section.title: Python 3 with Lists, Loops, Conditionals, and Functions
section.comment: Here is were you specify the content and order of your new book.

Each section heading (e.g. "SECTION 1: A Random Section") will be a heading in the table of contents. Source files that should be generated and included in that section should be placed on individual lines, with one line separating the first source filename and the :maxdepth: line.
Sources can also be included from subfolders of this directory. (e.g. "DataStructures/queues.rst").

section.title: Assignment Information
section.paragraph: Thank you for taking part in this assignment! We are using this assignment to try to improve the teaching and learning of programming.
This assignment has five parts. It will take approximately 50 minutes to complete. Please do the parts in order and answer questions to the best of your ability without any outside help.

paragraph.strong: You may stop working on any problem after you worked on it for ten minutes or more without solving it, but for full credit, you must try every problem for at least ten minutes.

section.paragraph: If you have questions about this assignment please email Dr. Jan Pearce at jpearce@ashesi.edu.gh.

list_item.paragraph: Pre Survey - Questions about your experience and confidence in computing
Introduction - Materials to get you familiar with the types of problems in this study

section.paragraph: Click on the link at the end of each page to get to the next part.

section.title: What to do next:
